title: Oh wow! Dragonblade riven is in the store! i can finally get her!
body:
"Rit0$ bundle on sale including dragonblade riven."

Get outta here you greedy as motherf......

Seriously? 4.5k rp? That's like 10 hours of work at a minimum wage job. (Don't whip out your calculators. but i know it's a lot)

edit: The downvotes for no reason...
